DOC.brief_summary: The project team developped validated French patient-based health-related quality life instrument kidney transplant : QoL Retrans . The aim study determine minimum significant change valdiated tool : ReTransQol
DOC.brief_title: For Better Interpretation Quality Life Scores Kidney Transplant Patients : Determination Minimum Significant Change RetransQol
DOC.criteria: Patient transplant kidney Patient able answer survey
